name: prototype
description: Prototype TAP that runs multiple runtimes, with the purpose of experimenting and obtaining empirical results when comparing Wasm vs. JavaScript runtimes

scripts.deploy:copy: node -e "require('fs').copyFile(process.argv[1], `filter_code_assemblyscript/${process.argv[2]}.ts`, (err) => err ? console.log('err found: ' + err) : console.log('AssemblyScript version saved'))"
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:copy %npm_config_src% %npm_config_id% -- && npm run deploy:compile --
